item.title: Why I Like C
item.author: troglobit@gmail.com (Joachim Nilsson)
item.description: I thought I was alone, but it turns out I’m not. Scott James Remnant describes exactly what I’ve been feeling the last couple of years. Read his blog entry on the subject. I couldn’t agree more.
